item.title: Migrated content from hallajs.net
item.description: I have “again” allowed my hallajs.net domain to expire and I’ll only be maintaining inu.io as of now. I’ve also migrated the content of hallajs.net here (although, I have to admit, it took a very long time). This site is now running on Middleman instead of Ghost :)
